titleStmt.title: An accurate examination of the principal texts usually alledged for the divinity of our Saviour and for the satisfaction by him made to the justice of God, for the sins of men : occasioned by a book of Mr. L. Milbourn, called Mysteries (in religion) vindicated.
titleStmt.author: Nye, Stephen, 1648?-1719.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Stephen Nye by Wing (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-56 imprints.
This item also appears as part of "A second collection of tracts ..." (Wing S2267), found at reel 1269:1.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
